description.value:
Your ears are finely tuned, able to detect even the slightest whispers of sound.

As long as you can hear normally, you can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Seek] action to sense @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Undetected] creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] instead of a @Template[type:cone|distance:30].

You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to locate undetected creatures that you could hear within 30 feet with a seek action.

rules.label: Whisper Elf (locate audible undetected within range)
